directives.base-uri: Restricts the URLs which can be used in a document's <base> element.
directives.child-src: Defines valid sources for web workers and nested browsing contexts.
directives.connect-src: Restricts the URLs which can be loaded using script interfaces (e.g., fetch, XHR).
directives.default-src: Serves as a fallback for the other fetch directives.
directives.fenced-frame-src: Specifies valid sources for nested browsing contexts loaded into <fencedframe> elements.
directives.font-src: Specifies valid sources for fonts loaded using @font-face.
directives.form-action: Restricts the URLs which can be used as the target of a form submissions.
directives.frame-ancestors: Specifies valid parents that may embed a page using <frame>, <iframe>, <object>, or <embed>.
directives.frame-src: Specifies valid sources for frames and iframes.
directives.img-src: Specifies valid sources of images and favicons.
directives.manifest-src: Specifies valid sources of application manifest files.
directives.media-src: Specifies valid sources for loading media using <audio> and <video>.
directives.object-src: Specifies valid sources for the <object> and <embed> elements.
directives.report-to: Provides a reporting endpoint for CSP violations.
directives.require-sri-for: Enforces Subresource Integrity on scripts and/or stylesheets.
directives.require-trusted-types-for: Enforces Trusted Types for scripts that create HTML from strings.
directives.sandbox: Enables a sandbox for the requested resource, similar to the <iframe> sandbox attribute.
directives.script-src-elem: Specifies valid sources for JavaScript <script> elements.
directives.script-src-attr: Specifies valid sources for JavaScript inline event handlers.
directives.style-src-elem: Specifies valid sources for stylesheets <style> elements and <link> elements with rel="stylesheet".
directives.style-src-attr: Specifies valid sources for inline styles applied to individual DOM elements.
directives.trusted-types: Specifies an allowlist of Trusted Types policies.
directives.upgrade-insecure-requests: Instructs user agents to treat all of a site's insecure URLs (HTTP) as though they have been replaced with secure URLs (HTTPS).
directives.worker-src: Specifies valid sources for Worker, SharedWorker, or ServiceWorker scripts.

ui.booleanDirectiveInfo: This is a boolean directive. It has no values.

directives.base-uri: Begrænser de URL'er, der kan bruges i et dokuments <base>-element.
directives.child-src: Definerer gyldige kilder til web workers og indlejrede browsing-kontekster.
directives.connect-src: Begrænser de URL'er, der kan indlæses ved hjælp af script-grænseflader (f.eks. fetch, XHR).
directives.default-src: Fungerer som en fallback for de andre fetch-direktiver.
directives.fenced-frame-src: Angiver gyldige kilder til indlejrede browsing-kontekster indlæst i <fencedframe>-elementer.
directives.font-src: Angiver gyldige kilder til skrifttyper indlæst ved hjælp af @font-face.
directives.form-action: Begrænser de URL'er, der kan bruges som mål for formularindsendelser.
directives.frame-ancestors: Angiver gyldige forældre, der kan indlejre en side ved hjælp af <frame>, <iframe>, <object> eller <embed>.
directives.frame-src: Angiver gyldige kilder til frames og iframes.
directives.img-src: Angiver gyldige kilder til billeder og favicons.
directives.media-src: Angiver gyldige kilder til indlæsning af medier ved hjælp af <audio> og <video>.
directives.require-sri-for: Håndhæver Subresource Integrity på scripts og/eller stylesheets.
directives.require-trusted-types-for: Håndhæver Trusted Types for scripts, der opretter HTML fra strenge.
directives.sandbox: Aktiverer en sandkasse for den ønskede ressource, svarende til <iframe> sandbox-attributten.
directives.script-src-attr: Angiver gyldige kilder til inline JavaScript-event-handlers.
directives.style-src-elem: Angiver gyldige kilder til stylesheets <style>-elementer og <link>-elementer med rel="stylesheet".
directives.style-src-attr: Angiver gyldige kilder til inline-styles anvendt på individuelle DOM-elementer.
directives.trusted-types: Angiver en tilladelsesliste over Trusted Types-politikker.
directives.upgrade-insecure-requests: Instruerer brugeragenter om at behandle alle usikre URL'er (HTTP) på et websted, som om de er blevet erstattet med sikre URL'er (HTTPS).
directives.worker-src: Angiver gyldige kilder til Worker, SharedWorker eller ServiceWorker scripts.

ui.booleanDirectiveInfo: Dette er et booleskt direktiv. Det har ingen værdier.
